A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Star Wars has always had humour but not on the level as TLJ has taken it. Cringy humour forced into almost every scene possible. Story line plot all over the place\, no direction\, key characters killed off without building any real depth and no real explanation as to how and why they are killed. Overall hugely disappointing.\nIf i wanted comedy il go watch an Adam Sandler movie
